content: Yes, starting with the Refusal of the Call could be an interesting way to kick off a documentary series about your journey as Kadence. This stage represents a common human experience, where individuals often resist change and cling to the familiar, even when they know deep down that it's not fulfilling or aligned with their goals and aspirations. By documenting your journey as you work through this stage, you could provide a relatable and inspiring story for others who are also facing similar challenges in their own lives. The journey through the hero's journey is a timeless and universal story, and by sharing your story through the lens of a documentary series, you have the opportunity to connect with and inspire a wide audience.
